Desc.entry: Organises student volunteers to help in a variety of fundraising activities throughout the year. Each year Rag supports different charities with the money raised from its collections and sponsored events. Rag Week is held yearly around Easter. Sponsored activities include a hitchhike (Bummit) in March, and walk (Spiderwalk) in October. Applications and guidelines can be downloaded from the website.

Address.entry: University of Sheffield Union of Students
